channel.title: Release Notes - 2017 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2017 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin 17.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes of Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin 17.10. Based on Aspose.Email for .NET API, this is a regular monthly release which contains all the fixes and enhancements that are part of Aspose.Email for .NET 17.10. For a complete list of what is new and fixed, visit the release notes section of Aspose.Email for .NET API.

item.title: Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin 17.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes of Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin 17.9. Based on Aspose.Email for .NET API, this is a regular monthly release which contains all the fixes and enhancements that are part of Aspose.Email for .NET 17.9. item.title: Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin 17.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes of Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin 17.8. Based on Aspose.Email for .NET API, this is a regular monthly release which contains all the fixes and enhancements that are part of Aspose.Email for .NET 17.8. For a complete list of what is new and fixed, visit the release notes section of Aspose.Email for .NET API. Major Features This release of Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin includes enhancement where embedded resources in message are saved along side the converted html.

item.title: Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin 17.7 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin 17.7. This is the first release of Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin. In future, regular monthly releases will be published. Aspose.Email for iOS via Xamarin has full functionality of Aspose.Email for .NET with few limitations, minor API changes and additional requirements. This version also includes all bug fixes and public API changes made in Aspose.Email for .NET 17.7, see release notes for more information.
